project.name: Context-Driven AI Financial Planning Platform
project.description: A modular AI-powered financial planner that converts life goals into logic-first, story-driven financial plans. Uses LLMs, behavior models, and visual pyramid-based reasoning to guide users toward real-world financial action.

instructions.content: Use the latest stable versions of libraries. Avoid deprecated setups and old CLIs (e.g., no CRA). Follow the modular folder structure and use TypeScript with tests and mock data.
